sentences.en: "I see what I would consider a normal patient population, representative of the average experience most people are having, " Brooklyn optometrist Justin Bazan, a paid consultant to the Vision Council.
sentences.cn: “我想我应该考虑哪些是一个正常的患者群体，平均代表有经验的大多数人。” 布鲁克林验光师贾斯汀·巴赞说道，他是视力协会的付费顾问。

sentences.en: One evaluation has shown that 70% of the people who received the new glasses corrected their own vision at least as well, if not better, than a trained optometrist.
sentences.cn: 评价表明，在得到新型眼镜的人中，有70％的人最起码与一位训练有素的验光配镜师一样很好地矫正了其视力。

words.tran_cn: 验光；[眼科] 视力测定法

trans.tran_en: someone who tests people’s eyes and orders glasses for them
